specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Perforated Pleated finishing involves placing the fabric between two molds and steaming it to create permanent pleats. This process adds texture and volume to the garment, producing a dynamic silhouette. Decoration > Puff Print Puff print is a type of rubber print that creates a raised, 3D texture on the fabric. This adds tactile interest and a bold visual effect. Decoration > Embroidery Embroidery is a decorative finishing that uses different stitches, yarns, and materials to create patterns on the fabric. This process adds visual interest, texture, and a handcrafted feel.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Dresses, Bridal
